name: Sleeping Otter
description:
## Sleeping Otter

This cute and cuddly otter loves nothing more than curling up on your head for a nap. A must-have for Project Dignity supporters

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
